mapper.select: select mem.member_id,member_name,member_password,member_email,member_gender,member_phonenum,member_address,member_reg_date,member_report_count,member_status, auth.member_auth from member mem Left Outer Join member_auth auth on mem.member_id = auth.member_id WHERE mem.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.update: update member set member_password = #{member_password}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_phonenum = #{member_phonenum}, member_address = #{member_address}, member_point = #{member_point} where member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: select x.* , CASE alarm_type WHEN 1 THEN participated_username||'님이 ['||free_title||'] 게시판에 댓글을 남기셨습니다.' END as alarm_message from ( select notice_seq, recieve_member_seq, notice_member_seq, c.member_id as participated_username , a.free_num,free_reply_num, alarm_type, alarm_regdate, alarm_readdate , d.free_title from free_alarm a join member c on a.notice_member_seq = c.member_id join free_board d on a.free_num = d.free_num where recieve_member_seq = #{free_num}) x
mapper.update: UPDATE alarm SET alarm_readdate = sysdate WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND alarm_readdate IS NULL
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM alarm WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND alarm_readdate IS NULL
